meanings.definition: A humorous anecdote or remark intended to provoke laughter.
meanings.sent1: The comedian told a funny joke during the show.
meanings.sent2: Everyone laughed at the joke the clown told.
meanings.sent3: The joke about the talking dog was so silly.
meanings.sent4: Her joke about the noisy neighbors was spot-on.
meanings.sent5: I still remember the joke my grandpa told last year.

meanings.definition: Something said or done to provoke laughter or amusement.
meanings.sent1: The prank was meant to be a harmless joke.
meanings.sent2: She didn't mean any harm; it was just a joke.
meanings.sent3: His joke about the dancing cat made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The joke about the clumsy elephant was quite amusing.
meanings.sent5: The kids couldn't stop giggling at the silly joke.

meanings.sent1: She loves to joke around with her friends.
meanings.sent2: He joked about the rainy weather to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent3: They like to joke and play pranks on each other.
meanings.sent4: I joked that the cat was secretly a ninja in disguise.
meanings.sent5: The siblings joked and laughed together all evening.
